item.title: 罗马尼亚首位后共产主义领导人扬-伊利埃斯库逝世，享年 95 岁
item.description: 罗马尼亚前总统扬-伊利埃斯库（Ion Iliescu）去世，他领导罗马尼亚完成了从共产主义向民主制的过渡，并因自己的政治过去而饱受争议。享年 95 岁。【原文：Ion Iliescu, the former Romanian president who steered his country through its transition from communism to democracy and was dogged by controversy over his own political past, has died. He was 95.】

item.title: 美国财政部将出售创纪录的 1000 亿美元四周期国债
item.description: 美国政府计划在本周的一次国债销售中借款 1,000 亿美元，这一史无前例的数字既显示了其借款需求的规模，也显示了其吸引投资者的能力。【原文：The US government plans to borrow $100 billion in a single Treasury debt sale this week, an unprecedented figure that showcases both the magnitude of its borrowing needs and its ability to attract investors.】

item.title: S&P 警告芝加哥养老金成本上涨将给预算带来压力
item.description: 据 S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）称，一项旨在提高芝加哥部分警察和消防员养老金福利的新法律有可能进一步加剧该市的财政压力。【原文：A new law aimed at raising pension benefits for some Chicago police and firefighters risks further straining the city’s finances, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司承诺向美国投资 10 亿美元以抵消关税影响
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司（Embraer SA）承诺在美国投资 10 亿美元，这家巴西飞机制造商正努力消除可能的关税带来的任何影响。【原文：Embraer SA pledged to invest $1 billion in the US as the Brazilian aircraft manufacturer seeks to blunt any fallout from possible tariffs.】

item.title: 逾期学生贷款创历史新高加重美国债务负担
item.description: 第二季度，美国消费者债务中严重拖欠债务的比例上升至 2020 年初以来的最高水平，反映出逾期学生贷款债务创纪录地激增。【原文：The share of US consumer debt in serious delinquency rose in the second quarter to the highest level since early 2020, reflecting a record surge in past-due student-loan debt.】

item.title: Sonos 承认过热的 Roam 扬声器数量 "非常少
item.description: Sonos Inc. 承认客户投诉的数量 "非常少"，他们声称该音响品牌的第一代 Roam 扬声器在 USB-C 端口附近过热并部分融化。【原文：Sonos Inc. acknowledged a “very low” number of complaints from customers who claim the audio brand’s first-generation Roam speaker has overheated and partially melted near the USB-C port.】

item.title: 两位前财政部长就美国国债风险发出警告
item.description: 全球金融危机期间在任的两位美国财政部部长都曾警告过 29 万亿美元的国债市场面临的潜在威胁，其中既有不可持续的财政道路，也有对华盛顿政治体制的担忧。【原文：The two US Treasury chiefs in office during the global financial crisis warned about potential threats to the $29 trillion Treasuries market ranging from an unsustainable fiscal path to concerns about the political system in Washington.】

item.title: 墨西哥力争到 2027 年实现墨西哥石油公司财务自给自足
item.description: 墨西哥提出了一项商业计划，要求墨西哥石油公司到 2027 年实现财务自给自足，同时增加产量，并在今年年底前削减约 130 亿美元的债务。【原文：Mexico presented a business plan for Petroleos Mexicanos to reach financial self sufficiency by 2027 while increasing output and slashing debt by roughly $13 billion by the end of the year.】

item.title: 马克-罗文斥责不愿交易私人资产的竞争对手
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.首席执行官马克-罗文（Marc Rowan）说，私人资产交易有可能使整个行业 "发生翻天覆地的变化"，他还说，那些抵制私人资产交易的公司一般都在收取高额费用，他们并不想让别人知道。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. Chief Executive Officer Marc Rowan said trading private assets has the potential to turn the industry “on its head” and said those who resist it are generally charging high fees that they don’t want revealed.】

item.title: 通胀支撑鹰派立场，荷兰国际集团看涨库鲁纳
item.description: 荷兰国际集团银行（ING Bank NV）认为，捷克克朗的表现可能会继续优于中欧同类货币，因为通胀风险表明央行将结束降息。【原文：The Czech koruna is likely to keep outperforming central European peers as inflation risks point to an end of the central bank’s interest rate cuts, according to ING Bank NV.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大学被黑数据包括银行账号和 GPA
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社对部分被盗数据的审查，哥伦比亚大学学生和校友的财务信息和学习成绩在最近的一次泄密事件中被盗。【原文：The financial information and academic performance of Columbia University students and alumni were stolen in a recent breach, according to a Bloomberg News review of some of the pilfered data.】

item.title: 美国服务业活动几近停滞，因为就业收缩
item.description: 由于企业面临需求不振和成本上升的问题，7 月份美国服务业实际上停滞不前。【原文：The US services sector effectively stagnated in July as firms — faced with tepid demand and rising costs — reduced headcount.】

item.title: 土耳其寻求在叙利亚建立工业区以促进贸易
item.description: 土耳其计划在叙利亚建设工业区，以发展该国饱受战争蹂躏的经济并促进跨境贸易。【原文：Turkey plans to build industrial zones in Syria to develop the country’s war-ravaged economy and boost cross-border trade.】

item.title: 麦格理收购葡萄牙医院集团 Luz Saude 股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）将收购葡萄牙医院运营商 Luz Saude SA 的少数股权，出价超过竞争对手 CVC Capital Partners Plc 和 KKR & Co.。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. is set to buy a minority stake in Portuguese hospital operator Luz Saude SA, outbidding rivals CVC Capital Partners Plc and KKR & Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美股因强劲盈利和降息押注而扩大涨幅
item.description: 美国股市在历史高点附近徘徊，原因是人们对 9 月份降息抱有希望，而且强劲的企业盈利推动最大的科技股走高。【原文：US stocks hovered around their record highs on hopes of September interest-rate cuts and as strong corporate earnings drove the biggest technology shares higher.】

item.title: 赞比亚希望从国际货币基金组织（IMF）项目延期中获得 1.45 亿美元的额外资金
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长表示，通过将其现有的国际货币基金组织贷款计划延长一年，赞比亚有望获得额外的1.45亿美元。【原文：Zambia expects to secure an extra $145 million by extending its existing International Monetary Fund loan program by a year, its finance chief said.】

item.title: Coinbase 20 亿美元可转换债券扩大加密货币筹款范围
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 将通过出售可转换债券筹集 20 亿美元资金，加入以加密货币为重点的公司抢滩市场锁定廉价资金的行列。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. is raising $2 billion from the sale of convertible bonds, joining a rush of cryptocurrency-focused companies tapping the market to lock in cheap capital.】

item.title: 特朗普的铜关税迄今适用于 150 亿美元的产品
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的第一波铜关税将打击去年价值超过 150 亿美元的进口产品，凸显了对美国制造商的潜在通胀影响。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s first wave of copper tariffs will hit imports valued at more than $15 billion last year, highlighting the potential inflationary impact on American manufacturers.】

item.title: Presidio 将通过 6.6 亿美元的 SPAC 合并在美国上市
item.description: 油气井效率公司 Presidio Investment Holdings LLC 已同意与空白支票公司 EQV Ventures Acquisition Corp. 合并，合并后的实体价值约为 6.6 亿美元。【原文：Oil and gas well efficiency company Presidio Investment Holdings LLC has agreed to merge with blank-check firm EQV Ventures Acquisition Corp. in a deal that values the combined entity at about $660 million.】

item.title: 风险投资公司 Eclipse 在押注特斯拉和 Rivian 之后聘用了 T. Rowe 的老将 Fath
item.description: 专注于制造业等现实世界行业初创企业的风险投资公司 Eclipse 已聘请 T. Rowe Price Group Inc.Rowe Price Group Inc. 投资者 Joe Fath 担任合伙人兼增长主管。【原文：Eclipse, a venture capital firm focused on startups in real-world industries like manufacturing, has hired longtime T. Rowe Price Group Inc. investor Joe Fath as partner and head of growth.】

item.title: Tripadvisor 持有人 Palliser 敦促进行战略审查，可能出售公司
item.description: Palliser Capital 正敦促 Tripadvisor Inc. 探索潜在的出售方案，这给这家已经面临另一名高调股东激进分子的旅游预订和点评网站带来了更大的压力。【原文：Palliser Capital is urging Tripadvisor Inc. to explore a potential sale, heaping pressure on the travel booking and review site that’s already facing another high-profile shareholder activist.】

item.title: 布隆迪大城市水龙头干涸，洪水风险迫在眉睫
item.description: 布隆迪最大城市的供水管道系统已经瘫痪，居民只能用水桶到中心取水点和河流取水。【原文：The water-pipeline system in the biggest cities in Burundi has collapsed, with residents resorting to taking buckets to central pickup points and rivers to obtain the basic commodity.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦卢比创一年多来最长连涨纪录
item.description: 在巴基斯坦央行表示将放缓购买美元以建立外汇储备之后，巴基斯坦卢比创下了自去年 4 月以来最长的日连涨记录。【原文：Pakistan’s rupee recorded its longest daily streak of gains since April last year after the central bank said it will slow buying of dollars to build its foreign exchange reserves.】

item.title: 进口下降导致美国贸易逆差缩小至 2023 年以来最紧水平
item.description: 美国贸易赤字在 6 月份收窄至 2023 年 9 月以来最紧张的水平，原因是企业在今年早些时候进口大幅激增后缩减了进口。【原文：The US trade deficit narrowed in June to the tightest since September 2023 as companies scaled back on imports after a massive surge earlier in the year.】

item.title: 布隆迪推选财政部长恩塔洪图耶为新总理
item.description: 布隆迪国民议会在内斯特-恩塔洪图耶被任命为财政部长仅八个月后，选举他为新总理。【原文：Burundi’s National Assembly has elected Nestor Ntahontuye as the new prime minister, just eight months after he was named finance minister.】

item.title: 加拿大货物贸易逆差因机械进口而扩大
item.description: 加拿大商品贸易逆差在第二季度创下历史新高，6 月份的进出口差距有所扩大。【原文：Canada’s merchandise trade deficit reached a record high in the second quarter, with June’s gap between exports and imports expanding.】

item.title: OpenAI、谷歌和 Anthropic 赢得美国批准的民用人工智能合同
item.description: 美国政府的中央采购部门正在将OpenAI、Alphabet公司旗下的谷歌和Anthropic公司列入批准的人工智能供应商名单，这为民用联邦机构广泛采用人工智能技术打开了大门。【原文：The US government’s central purchasing arm is adding OpenAI, Alphabet Inc.’s Google and Anthropic to a list of approved artificial intelligence vendors, opening the door to widespread adoption of the technology across civilian federal agencies.】

item.title: 企业在财报电话会议中吹捧特朗普税收法案带来的更多投资和订单
item.description: 企业纷纷称赞唐纳德-特朗普总统的新税法促进了消费能力。【原文：Companies are praising President Donald Trump’s new tax law as a boost to spending power.】

item.title: 汉莎航空退出入股欧洲航空的谈判
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）放弃了入股欧洲航空公司（Air Europa）的谈判，土耳其航空公司（Turkish Airlines）成为这家西班牙航空公司仅存的竞购者，此前法航-荷航（Air France-KLM）也退出了谈判，而国际航空集团（IAG SA）也两次被拒绝收购控股权。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG has abandoned negotiations to take a stake in Air Europa, leaving Turkish Airlines as the only remaining bidder for the Spanish airline after Air France-KLM also withdrew and IAG SA was denied twice to buy a holding.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德以 60 亿美元收购杜克能源佛罗里达公用事业公司股权
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）同意以 60 亿美元的价格收购杜克能源公司（Duke Energy Corp.【原文：Brookfield Asset Management agreed to buy a 19.7% stake in Duke Energy Corp.’s Florida utility for $6 billion, a deal that will accelerate investment in the grid as the state’s population soars.】
